Description:
Lot 822- Coriyule Estate
This allotment measures 560m2 and has a 16m frontage. Now pre-selling with Titles expected late 2017. The Coriyule Estate Curlewis is located on the Bellarine Peninsula just 17kms from Geelong CBD and within close proximity to Portarlington Ferry Service, beaches, wineries, and all the amenities that this wonderful area has to offer. The Bellarine rail trail is also right on your door step and the Clifton Springs marina is a short distance down the road. Our estate gives you the freedom to create without the frustrating restrictions developers often place on the new estates. The National Broadband Network (NBN) is in the Coriyule Estate to provide you with highest quality internet experience. This exciting release of land is now available with a range of block sizes if this allotment isn't for you. Secure your future home site today.

Description:
Great Coastal Value
Want to take in the ocean breeze from your own doorstep? Well here is your chance to build your dream home along Geelong's amazing Bellerine Peninsula. Positioned in one of the newest coastal estates and comprising of a very spacious 582m2 approximately. Minutes from Clifton Springs Golf Course, Drysdale main shopping precinct, some of Geelong's best coastal beaches and still only a 20-minute drive from Geelong CBD. This parcel of land is great value and surely will attract good interest.

Description:
A Timeless Masterpiece
An inspired architectural designed luxury home combining the 154 year old St Francis Catholic Church and a modern French provincial extension creating a bayside masterpiece.
The detail within the restoration is nothing shy of spectacular with the original marble alter forming part of the kitchen, the stained lead light windows are a statement piece, and the auditorium offers the finest dining rooms one will ever find.
The modern architecture is truly captivating and boasts some of the finest in designer fixture and fittings including a helix staircase and imported French antique chandeliers.
- Set on 2 acres of manicured gardens
- Located on the Bellarine Peninsula with views across Corio Bay
- Kitchen with all marble bench tops and splash backs-Miele appliances
- Hydronic heating and reverse cycle cooling
- Electric windows and remote feature lighting
- Bang and Olufsen sound system
- Stunning courtyard with feature pond and fountain
- Large commercial size garage with remove control heavy duty doors
- Commercial opportunities including B and B or reception centre
- Iconic Australian home that must be inspected
Insights: 1030 Portarlington Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Absolutely Exceptional Quality in Curlewis Parks
Youâ??ll love this gorgeous home located in the beautiful Curlewis Parks Estate. This 4 bedroom and 2 bathroom home offers 24 squares of living with a generous outdoor decking area and is situated on a comparatively large lot size of 556 m2, which presents as the perfect opportunity for the astute buyer. Built only 3 years ago, the home is in immaculate condition incorporating a neutral palette throughout. With stunning timber floors from the entry, a large open plan dining/living area that leads to a floor to ceiling timber feature window overlooking the outdoor entertaining area allowing an abundance of natural light into the hub of the home. The stylish kitchen, with a Caesar stone benchtop and tiled splashback, is equipped with stainless steel appliances and walk-in pantry that overlooks the living/dining area which opens up via stacked sliding doors to the outdoor entertaining area. A second living area offers plenty additional space for the family. Double doors open up to the master bedroom with plantation shutters throughout, a generous walk-in robe and ensuite. The 3 other spacious bedrooms all have built-in robes. The home is fully landscaped with low maintenance gardens and side rear access which is rare in the estate. The home is connected to the fibre optic network and fully equipped with a smart hub and wiring as well as LED downlights throughout the entire home. Without a doubt, 11 Domain Avenue is one of the finest quality homes in Curlewis Parks and is the perfect entertainer. If youâ??re looking to move to take advantage of all that Bellarine has to offer with award winning wineries and restaurants close by, multiple options of schools, shopping centres and amenities then an inspection is a must.

Description:
5 Acre Lifestyle Property!
This beautiful home exudes comfort and class. In a tightly held pocket of Curlewis a home to escape to and enjoy. The current Vendors have given this place a makeover worth seeing. New kitchen anyone would enjoy preparing food in. Large windows front and back bring the outside in. No expense spared here. Wood heater for those cold winter nights.
Rooms of large proportions and furnished to suit. A total of five acres (approx.) of land with this home. All ready for the ponies. Full olympic size, all weather, flood lit dressage arena is ready for use. Already fenced paddocks complete with stables and shedding. I have never seen a neater place. It's a credit to the owners. This lifestyle choice could be yours. Only fifteen minutes from Geelong, off the beaten track. So tranquil and peaceful. The Bellarine Peninsula is a place that offers all you need to have a life catering for day to day activities and recreation.

Description:
A Great Time To INVEST!
Now is the time to grow your portfolio with this great opportunity to secure this property.
A well-presented and maintained property, located in the new Curlewis Estate just 500m from Bayview Central Curlewis Shopping Centre. Less than 5 years old the home consists of four bedrooms all with built in robes. Master bedroom complete with walk in robe and ensuite. Open plan lounge, meals and kitchen area offering a great space for the family along with a separate lounge for keeping all the family occupied. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, gas hot plates and electric oven. Central heating and cooling throughout. A double garage completes the property with access internally to the property together with a single door drive through to the rear of the property. Currently leased at $370 per week by great tenants, this property would make the perfect investment to start or add to your existing portfolio

Description:
Modern Living with Lifestyle Convenience
If you have been looking for the perfect excuse NOT to build, then your wish has come true with this wonderful family home in the Bellarine's newest growth area - CURLEWIS! Only 4 years old, this delightfully presented Simonds built home offers superior quality and functional design throughout. Comprising 3 bedrooms, master with WIR, full ensuite, dual vanity basins and large shower, BIRs in the other 2BRs which are serviced by a central family bathroom and 2 separate living areas. The modern quality kitchen features an island bench, 900mm oven, dishwasher, large pantry and loads of storage. A clever floorplan allows for open yet dedicated living areas, which include the central family and meals zone and separate lounge/games area. Walk through the sliding doors from the main living domain and enjoy a great undercover alfresco entertaining area which is the perfect spot to wine and dine with plenty of room for family occasions. And for those buyers looking for that all important side access for trailer/boat/caravan, this is the one with a double remote garage with internal access as well as room on the side leading through gates to to the family friendly and low maintenance back garden with grassed areas for the kids or pets. Perfect for tradies as well.
Other features include ducted gas heating, evaporative cooling throughout and solar powered hot water.
Secure a strategic stake in a high growth coastal area offering an exceptional lifestyle attraction and enquire today!
Insights: 9 Northsun Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 14 other 3 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Buy today see value tomorrow !!
This delightful new build has all the upgrades you could hope for in a spacious family home.
Close to all your daily essentials and a short drive to all your great coastal beaches, cafes and wineries.
Boasting 4 bedrooms, master with WIR and ensuite, 2nd central bathroom, movie room/rumpus, kitchen with all the bells and whistles including a mirror splash back, stone bench tops and all your top appliances.
A second family room is located to the rear of the home and also gives access to the undercover alfresco area. The rest of the yard is completed by a spa in the decked area and landscaped throughout. Extras include ducted heating, A/C cooling, BIR's, DLUG with internal access and lots more. Great value in a fantastic new area in one of the Bellerine's best estates.

Description:
Outstanding Quality in Curlewis Parks
Located in the beautiful Curlewis Parks Estate, 8 Longwood Street is the perfect opportunity for you to buy into the booming Curlewis housing market. This four bedroom 2 bathroom home offers 24 squares of living on a 398sqm smart block, which would suit a retired couple or a busy family on the go. Built 2 years ago, the home is in immaculate condition with bright living spaces throughout. The main bedroom at the front of the home includes walk in robe and full ensuite while the other 3 bedrooms have built in robes. The stylish kitchen features a walk in pantry and island bench with Caesar stone bench tops that overlooks the open plan living/dining. A separate lounge area provides the perfect combination of parents/children's quarters for all the family to enjoy. Without a doubt, 8 Longwood Street is one of the finest quality homes in Curlewis Parks and is the perfect entertainer. If youâ??re looking to move to take advantage of all that Bellarine has to offer with award winning wineries and restaurants close by, multiple options of schools, shopping centres and amenities then an inspection is a must.
